organic_results.title: Collaborative relations among elementary school teachers
organic_results.snippet: This study deals with the lateral dimension of school organization--collaborative relationships among teachers on teams. The paper focuses on relationships between task interdependencies and the methods of collegial influence. Collegial influence is unrelated to interdependence, and is instead explained by the visibility of the classroom setting and the development of explicit norms or policies. Explanations of these findings are discussed and comparison made between collaborative relations among teachers and those of other …

publication_info.summary: E Bredo - Sociology of Education, 1977 - JSTOR
